title: Simulated Clouds For Raster Files
text: First load package. illustrate adding cloud cover example raster. First look example raster  simulate 70 × 70 pixels cloud  Next, match extent projection simulated cloud raster original raster.  Now, filter cloud convert values NAs add ask masks next stage.   Finally, can now add clouds original raster
code: library(nimbus) library(raster) #> Loading required package: sp ## basic example code library(raster) plot(example_raster) cloud <- simulate_cloud(phi = 0.1, seed = 2023) plot(cloud) cloud <- match_rasters(example_raster, cloud) plot(cloud) cloud #> class      : RasterLayer  #> dimensions : 7061, 7911, 55859571  (nrow, ncol, ncell) #> resolution : 30, 30  (x, y) #> extent     : 426885, 664215, 7019185, 7231015  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax) #> crs        : +proj=utm +zone=55 +south +ellps=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs  #> source     : memory #> names      : Z  #> values     : -5.199408, 5.321076  (min, max) speckled_cloud <- filter_cloud(cloud) large_cloud <- filter_cloud(cloud, type = "large") plot(speckled_cloud) plot(large_cloud) example_raster |> add_cloud(speckled_cloud) |> plot() example_raster |> add_cloud(large_cloud) |> plot()
